ad_text: A-1 environmental septic tank services Sponsored This job is Monday thru Friday. You have to be at the shop at 6:00 am. You would have to help the lead driver uncover septic tanks and help him pump the septic tank. Then help him cover the tank back up. Help load the hoses when complete and do the paperwork. We get paid weekly on Wednesday what you make depends on what know. You will never work on the weekends. We are usually off by 4:00 pm. You do need reliable transportation to get to work. You do on average 5 to 6 jobs a day. There is alot of riding involved going from job to job. We have a competitive pay scale. You get 6 paid holidays a year. If you are interested please call Brittney Littrell at 205-674-8999. FULL-TIME · $700 / WEEK · MOUNT OLIVE, ALABAMA Pump Truck Helper Apply now
